prospectus.translation[0].definitions[0]: a small book that advertises a school, college, new business etc
prospectus.translation[0].definitions[1]: a document produced by a company that wants the public to buy its shares
prospectus.translation[1].definitions[0]: a document produced by a company when inviting the public to buy its shares. By law, the company must include certain information in a prospectus, such as how the money is going to be used, what the chances of future success are etc
The full prospectus for the share sale will be out next Thursday.
prospectus.translation[1].definitions[1]: a small book that advertises a school, college, new business etc
Each year the college publishes a postgraduate prospectus which contains details of the degree courses offered.
